OUR BRANDS

5+ Years in Business

Founded in 2019 by Piran Tarapore and Pearl Jain, Point Of was born from a simple idea: create exceptional brand experiences and make the process as joyful as the outcome.

100% Independent

As an independent studio, we’re free to think long-term and agile enough to move when it matters most.

25+ Global Brand Partners

Our team connects over an unconditional love for making digital things and pushing the boundaries of what’s possible on the web.

A Place to Work

Our headquarters sit quietly in Lower Parel, Mumbai—an urban oasis that holds onto the memory of Bombay’s industrial past while embracing the city’s creative energy. Since our founding in 2021, we’ve collaborated with clients across India and internationally, building work that resonates beyond borders.

At Point Of, we value curiosity, clarity, and collaboration. We’re a team shaped by culture, driven by design, and always eager to explore what’s next. Whether you’re a brand looking for a thoughtful partner or a creative looking for your next chapter—our doors are open.

JOIN US

Design Obsessed Duo

We know brands, we know design. Our experience spans a combined 10 years. While we're a small core duo, our network of collaborators runs deep- if we can't build it, we know who can.

Piran Tarapore

CO-FOUNDER & MANAGING DIRECTOR

Piran Tarapore is a strategic thinker & marketing specialist with a passion for building brands that resonate. He drives business growth, marketing strategy, & brand positioning for clients across industries.

CONNECT

Pearl Jain

CO-FOUNDER & CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Pearl Jain is a visionary product designer & creative strategist from Bombay, currently based in Barcelona. she leads the studio’s eorts in craing compelling brand experiences that are both innovative & culturally relevant.

CONNECT
